pages.text: Norwegian Elkhounds were originally bred for hunting big game in Europe, such as moose and even bears.$(br2)Standing just under a block tall, these intelligent dogs come in five coats.
These dogs can most commonly be found in snowy plains, ice spikes, and around frozen rivers. They can also be found in snowy taigas and groves, and more rarely in eroded badlands.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Beef Treat.
